      • getColors

        public List<String> getColors()
        Returns the custom color pattern for the data. The first data has the first color, the second data has the second color, and so on.
        Returns:
        the custom color pattern for the data

      • setColors

        public void setColors(List<String> colors)
        Sets the custom color pattern for the data. The first data has the first color, the second data has the second color, and so on.
        Parameters:
        colors - the custom color pattern for the data

      • addColor

        public void addColor(String color)
        Adds a color to the list of custom color patterns for the data. The first data has the first color, the second data has the second color, and so on.
        Parameters:
        color - a String representation of a color

      • addColor

        Adds a color to the list of custom color patterns for the data. The first data has the first color, the second data has the second color, and so on.
        Parameters:
